title: Task Tracker API Architecture
content:
# Task Tracker API Architecture

## Stack
- FastAPI 0.104.1
- SQLAlchemy 2.0.23 (ORM)
- Alembic 1.13.0 (migrations)
- PostgreSQL 15
- Sentry SDK 1.39.1

## Database
Alembic migrations run on startup via `alembic upgrade head`.
The connection string is configured via `POSTGRES_URI` environment variable.

## Key Endpoints
- `GET /api/v1/tasks/` â€” list tasks
- `POST /api/v1/tasks/` â€” create task
- `GET /api/v1/users/` â€” list users
- `GET /api/v1/organizations/` â€” list organizations
